ABOUT_US.MARY: Project Manager. Full stack developer.	 We are a team of students at The Rolling Scopes School developing the Project Management App. Time is the most precious thing in our life. Let's organize it right!
ABOUT_US.DIMA: Fullstack developer. We are committed to effective project management so that your goals are achieved faster and at the lowest cost.
ABOUT_US.MARGO: Frontend developer. We are working on setting up a connection between man and space, creating a harmony of their interaction.
